metadata.title: The Flat Pack
metadata.author: Limrix
metadata.description:
Requires hyperspace, multiverse, BrightnessParticles, VertexUtils, and Lightweight Lua to work.
Adds characters from the game Flat Form Fighter as crew. Crew are at stores, or you can spawn them with CREW [crewname]
Current cast: F22: fast boi name: fff_f22
Thanks to Jail for the use of Flat Form Fighter Brightlord, Arc, and ChronoVortex for help coding the room detection and rerouting.
